Type Parameters:
T - The type of the locked resource
Direct Known Subclasses:

public class Lock<T>
extends java.lang.Object

An object used to lock a resource

Balazs Pete

canRead

public boolean canRead(Lock.Token token)
Determine whether the holder of the token can read the object

Parameters:
token - The token
Returns:
True if the token is currently read locking the object, false otherwise

               throws LockException
Get the stored resource

Returns:
The resource stored in the lock
Throws:
